slides.title: CRM Setup
slides.description: Comprehensive CRM setup to optimize customer data management, lead capture, and automation.

features.description: A tool designed to optimize the conversion process and capture leads efficiently.
A unified view of customer data for personalized communication and efficient management of relationships.
Tools for capturing leads through forms, ads, and campaigns with automated follow-up sequences.
Automated email sequences with tracking for opens, clicks, and conversions.
Seamless connection between CRM and social platforms like LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter for posting and tracking.
Secure data storage and encrypted transfers, ensuring patient data protection.
Custom dashboards displaying KPIs such as lead generation, conversions, and email performance metrics.

slides.title: Project Management & Timeline Projections
slides.description: A structured approach to managing the project with milestones, coordination, and a phased timeline.

KeyFocusAreas.description: Keeping the project on schedule by setting clear deadlines for each phase.
Ensuring smooth communication and collaboration between all stakeholders.
Holding regular meetings to provide updates, resolve issues, and align everyone on project goals.

CoreProjectServices.description: Using Agile sprint cycles to manage tasks efficiently, adapt to changes, and deliver incremental progress.
Dividing the project into clear phases with specific deliverables for each phase.
Identifying potential challenges and developing mitigation strategies to avoid delays and cost overruns.
Monitoring resource utilization and tracking the budget to ensure that the project stays on time and within budget.
